abstract: Nearly 25 million viewers tuned in for final results of ABC’s “Dancing With the Stars” on Tuesday, according to Nielsen’s estimates, the largest audience for the series this season but less than the fall finale a year ago. The two-hour show, which followed a rebroadcast of the Charlie Brown Christmas special at 8 p.m. (which drew 13.6 million viewers), helped put ABC on top of the night’s ratings overall.
lead_paragraph: Nearly 25 million viewers tuned in for final results of ABC’s “Dancing With the Stars” on Tuesday, according to Nielsen’s estimates, the largest audience for the series this season but less than the fall finale a year ago. The two-hour show, which followed a rebroadcast of the Charlie Brown Christmas special at 8 p.m. (which drew 13.6 million viewers), helped put ABC on top of the night’s ratings overall.

headline.main: Almost 25 Million Watch The ‘Dancing With the Stars’ Conclusion
